snippet: Eight of the 12 Fed districts reported modest to moderate advancement.
abstract: Beige Book survey finds eight of the 12 Federal Reserve districts reported modest to moderate advancement from January through early February; says severe weather hurt growth in much of nation.
lead_paragraph: Eight of the 12 Fed districts reported modest to moderate advancement.

headline.main: Growth Hurt by Bad Weather, Fed Says
headline.print_headline: Growth Hurt by Bad Weather, Fed Says
